title: SteelFlex Leader Hose for Garden Hose Reel - 3/4” Braided Stainless Steel Outdoor Short Water Hose - Flexible, No Kinks, Tangles - Withstands Extreme Pressure, Weather, Temperature - 3 Foot Length
features: ✅ A GARDEN MUST-HAVE - Elevate your gardening with this ultra-duty stainless steel braided, weatherproof short garden hose. It has male and female rust-proof alloy hex-shaped connectors that link your faucet and garden hose reel securely and without any leaks. A 3/4 inch hose diameter allows for superior water flow and up to 450psi water pressure capability
✅ IMPRESSIVE FLEXIBILITY - Tired of your garden hoses getting all tangled up? This 3' hose is what you need. This short water hose extends and stops kinks from forming with its flexible design.
✅ BUILT FOR EXTREMES - The heavy-duty nature of this 3' water hose is remarkable. It performs with high water pressure and extreme weather situations, withstanding temperatures from -40C to 70C.
✅ DESIGNED TO LAST - The strength of our small garden hose extension ensures a long life cycle. Made from braided stainless steel and aluminum alloy hex connectors, rust or corrosion isn't a worry
✅ RISK-FREE PURCHASE - Buy this high pressure garden hose with confidence! We stand by the quality of our products. The heavy duty water hose doesn’t meet your standards? We’ll make it right.
description: Does your hose get tangled whenever you use it?

Gardening is hard work, especially when you’re carrying about and moving a hose over 50 feet. The weight alone is enough to make you groan, but even worse are the knots that form along the length of your hose and reel. You’ll have to go all the way back just to figure out how to untangle it. It’s impractical, draining, and time-consuming. It doesn’t have to be this difficult, though. You’ve come to the right place to find a product that lets you connect a reel to a faucet without turning it into one large jumbled mess.
Introducing, the SteelFlex 3’ Leader Hose for Garden Hose Reel!

Make tangled hoses a thing of the past with this high-performance leader hose. This garden accessory is highly flexible, allowing you to move about freely without worrying the hose would form kinks. Its aluminum alloy hex couplings latch tightly onto your reel and your spigot, reducing leaks and providing a secure connection. We built this leader hose with durability in mind. That’s why its primary material is braided 304 stainless steel, known for its unrivaled strength. The braiding also improves the product’s sturdiness and elasticity. And since it’s stainless, the hose is naturally resilient versus rust and corrosion. This lawn care accessory works in practically any setting. Its connection remains intact even when the water pressure is high. It’s also weatherproof and can perform in harsh cold as low as -40°C and in extreme heat of up to 70°C.
Learn more about our product here:
✅ Length: 3 feet ✅ Connector Diameter: 3/4 inches ✅ Drinking water safe, no BPAs or lead content
Make gardening a breeze with the right tools. Add the SteelFlex 3’ Leader Hose for Garden Hose Reel to your cart NOW!
